text: ninakk yathārtha jñānaṁ vannettiyaśēṣaṁ ‎ikkāryattil āreṅkiluṁ ninnēāṭ tarkkikkān ‎varunnuveṅkil avarēāṭu paṟayuka: "niṅṅaḷ varū! ‎nam'muṭe irukūṭṭaruṭeyuṁ makkaḷeyuṁ strīkaḷeyuṁ ‎namukku viḷiccucērkkāṁ. namukk ottucērnn, ‎kūṭṭāyi akamaḻiññ prārthikkāṁ: “kaḷḷaṁ ‎paṟayunnavarkk daivaśāpaṁ uṇṭāvaṭṭe" ‎
